blocks.name: df-sh
blocks.content: Define the set of subspaces of a Hilbert space. See ~ issh for its membership relation. Basically, a subspace is a subset of a Hilbert space that acts like a vector space. From Definition of [Beran] p. 95. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: issh
blocks.content: Subspace ` H ` of a Hilbert space. A subspace is a subset of Hilbert space which contains the zero vector and is closed under vector addition and scalar multiplication. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm issh(class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, csh), wa(wa(wss(c0, chba), wcel(c0v, c0)), wa(wss(cima(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), c0), wss(cima(csm, cxp(cc, c0)), c0))))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wcel(c0, csh), wa(wa(wss(c0, chba), wcel(c0v, c0)), wa(wss(cima(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), c0), wss(cima(csm, cxp(cc, c0)), c0))), wa(wcel(c0, cpw(chba)), w3a(wcel(c0v, c0), wss(cima(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), c0), wss(cima(csm, cxp(cc, c0)), c0))), wa(wss(c0, chba), wa(wcel(c0v, c0), wa(wss(cima(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), c0), wss(cima(csm, cxp(cc, c0)), c0)))))
  anbi12i(wcel(c0, cpw(chba)), w3a(wcel(c0v, c0), wss(cima(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), c0), wss(cima(csm, cxp(cc, c0)), c0)), wss(c0, chba), wa(wcel(c0v, c0), wa(wss(cima(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), c0), wss(cima(csm, cxp(cc, c0)), c0))))
  elpw2(c0, chba)
  ax-hilex()
  3anass(wcel(c0v, c0), wss(cima(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), c0), wss(cima(csm, cxp(cc, c0)), c0))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, csh, cpw(chba), w3a(wcel(c0v, c0), wss(cima(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), c0), wss(cima(csm, cxp(cc, c0)), c0)), w3a(wcel(c0v, cv(hs0)), wss(cima(cva, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), cv(hs0)), wss(cima(csm, cxp(cc, cv(hs0))), cv(hs0))))
  3anbi123d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c0v, cv(hs0)), wss(cima(cva, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), cv(hs0)), wss(cima(csm, cxp(cc, cv(hs0))), cv(hs0)), wcel(c0v, c0), wss(cima(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), c0), wss(cima(csm, cxp(cc, c0)), c0))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, c0v)
  sseq12d(cima(cva, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))), cv(hs0), cima(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  imaeq2d(cva, cxp(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), cxp(c0, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sqxpeqd(cv(hs0), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sseq12d(cima(csm, cxp(cc, cv(hs0))), cv(hs0), cima(csm, cxp(cc, c0)), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  imaeq2d(csm, cxp(cc, cv(hs0)), cxp(cc, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  xpeq2(cv(hs0), c0, cc)
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  df-sh(hs0)
  anass(wss(c0, chba), wcel(c0v, c0), wa(wss(cima(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), c0), wss(cima(csm, cxp(cc, c0)), c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(chba))
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0v, c0), wss(cima(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), c0), wss(cima(csm, cxp(cc, c0)), c0)))
}

blocks.name: issh2
blocks.content: Subspace ` H ` of a Hilbert space. A subspace is a subset of Hilbert space which contains the zero vector and is closed under vector addition and scalar multiplication. Definition of [Beran] p. 95. (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm issh2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, csh), wa(wa(wss(c0, chba), wcel(c0v, c0)), wa(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1)), c0))), wral(s0, cc, wral(s1, c0, wcel(co(cv(s0), csm, cv(s1)), c0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, csh), wa(wa(wss(c0, chba), wcel(c0v, c0)), wa(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1)), c0))), wral(s0, cc, wral(s1, c0, wcel(co(cv(s0), csm, cv(s1)), c0))))), wa(wa(wss(c0, chba), wcel(c0v, c0)), wa(wss(cima(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), c0), wss(cima(csm, cxp(cc, c0)), c0))))
  issh(c0)
  pm5.32i(wa(wss(c0, chba), wcel(c0v, c0)), wa(wss(cima(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), c0), wss(cima(csm, cxp(cc, c0)), c0)), wa(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1)), c0))), wral(s0, cc, wral(s1, c0, wcel(co(cv(s0), csm, cv(s1)), c0)))))
  adantr(wss(c0, chba), wcel(c0v, c0), wb(wa(wss(cima(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), c0), wss(cima(csm, cxp(cc, c0)), c0)), wa(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1)), c0))), wral(s0, cc, wral(s1, c0, wcel(co(cv(s0), csm, cv(s1)), c0))))))
  anbi12d(wss(c0, chba), wss(cima(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), c0), wss(cima(csm, cxp(cc, c0)), c0), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1)), c0))), wral(s0, cc, wral(s1, c0, wcel(co(cv(s0), csm, cv(s1)), c0))))
  sylancr(wss(c0, chba), wb(wss(cima(cva, cxp(c0, c0)), c0), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(co(cv(s0), cva, cv(s1)), c0)))), wfun(cva), wss(cxp(c0, c0), cdm(cva)))
  ax-mp(wfun(cva), wf(cva, cxp(chba, chba), chba))
  ffun(cva, cxp(chba, chba), chba)
  syl6sseqr(cxp(c0, c0), cdm(cva), cxp(chba, chba), wss(c0, chba))
  anidms(wss(c0, chba), wss(cxp(c0, c0), cxp(chba, chba)))
  xpss12(c0, chba, c0, chba)
  fdmi(cva, cxp(chba, chba), chba)
  ax-hfvadd()
  funimassov(s0, s1, cva, c0, c0, c0)
  sylancr(wss(c0, chba), wb(wss(cima(csm, cxp(cc, c0)), c0), wral(s0, cc, wral(s1, c0, wcel(co(cv(s0), csm, cv(s1)), c0)))), wfun(csm), wss(cxp(cc, c0), cdm(csm)))
  ax-mp(wfun(csm), wf(csm, cxp(cc, chba), chba))
  ffun(csm, cxp(cc, chba), chba)
  syl6sseqr(cxp(cc, c0), cdm(csm), cxp(cc, chba), wss(c0, chba))
  xpss2(c0, chba, cc)
  fdmi(csm, cxp(cc, chba), chba)
  ax-hfvmul()
  funimassov(s0, s1, csm, cc, c0, c0)
  diff.cva.s(s0)
  diff.cva.s(s1)
  diff.csm.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.csm.s(s1)
  diff.cc.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm issh2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ SH ↔((c0 ⊆ ~H ∧ 0h ∈ c0)∧(∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0[+h]s1)∈ c0))∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ℂ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0[.h]s1)∈ c0)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ∈ SH, ((c0 ⊆ ~H ∧ 0h ∈ c0)∧(∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0[+h]s1)∈ c0))∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ℂ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0[.h]s1)∈ c0)))), ((c0 ⊆ ~H ∧ 0h ∈ c0)∧((+h "(c0 × c0))⊆ c0 ∧(.h "(ℂ × c0))⊆ c0)))
  issh(c0)
  pm5.32i((c0 ⊆ ~H ∧ 0h ∈ c0), ((+h "(c0 × c0))⊆ c0 ∧(.h "(ℂ × c0))⊆ c0), (∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0[+h]s1)∈ c0))∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ℂ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0[.h]s1)∈ c0))))
  adantr(c0 ⊆ ~H, 0h ∈ c0, (((+h "(c0 × c0))⊆ c0 ∧(.h "(ℂ × c0))⊆ c0)↔(∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0[+h]s1)∈ c0))∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ℂ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0[.h]s1)∈ c0)))))
  anbi12d(c0 ⊆ ~H, (+h "(c0 × c0))⊆ c0, (.h "(ℂ × c0))⊆ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0[+h]s1)∈ c0)), ∀(s0 ∈ ℂ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0[.h]s1)∈ c0)))
  sylancr(c0 ⊆ ~H, ((+h "(c0 × c0))⊆ c0 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0[+h]s1)∈ c0))), Fun(+h), (c0 × c0)⊆ dom(+h))
  ax-mp(Fun(+h), (+h :(~H × ~H)→ ~H))
  ffun(cva, (~H × ~H), chba)
  syl6sseqr((c0 × c0), dom(+h), (~H × ~H), c0 ⊆ ~H)
  anidms(c0 ⊆ ~H, (c0 × c0)⊆(~H × ~H))
  xpss12(c0, chba, c0, chba)
  fdmi(cva, (~H × ~H), chba)
  ax-hfvadd()
  funimassov(s0, s1, cva, c0, c0, c0)
  sylancr(c0 ⊆ ~H, ((.h "(ℂ × c0))⊆ c0 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ ℂ, ∀(s1 ∈ c0,(s0[.h]s1)∈ c0))), Fun(.h), (ℂ × c0)⊆ dom(.h))
  ax-mp(Fun(.h), (.h :(ℂ × ~H)→ ~H))
  ffun(csm, (ℂ × ~H), chba)
  syl6sseqr((ℂ × c0), dom(.h), (ℂ × ~H), c0 ⊆ ~H)
  xpss2(c0, chba, cc)
  fdmi(csm, (ℂ × ~H), chba)
  ax-hfvmul()
  funimassov(s0, s1, csm, cc, c0, c0)
  diff.cva.s(s0)
  diff.cva.s(s1)
  diff.csm.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.csm.s(s1)
  diff.cc.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: shss
blocks.content: A subspace is a subset of Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 9-Oct-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: shel
blocks.content: A member of a subspace of a Hilbert space is a vector. (Contributed by NM, 14-Dec-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: shex
blocks.content: The set of subspaces of a Hilbert space exists (is a set). (Contributed by NM, 23-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm shex() {
  |- wcel(csh, universe)
} = {
  ssexi(csh, cpw(chba))
  pwex(chba)
  ax-hilex()
  ssriv(hs0, csh, cpw(chba))
  sylibr(wcel(cv(hs0), csh), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(chba)), wss(cv(hs0), chba))
  shss(cv(hs0))
  selpw(hs0, chba)
  diff.hs0.c(csh)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(chba))
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm shex() {
  ⊢ SH ∈ 𝕌
} = {
  ssexi(csh, P(~H))
  pwex(chba)
  ax-hilex()
  ssriv(hs0, csh, P(~H))
  sylibr(hs0 ∈ SH, hs0 ∈ P(~H), hs0 ⊆ ~H)
  shss(hs0)
  selpw(hs0, chba)
  diff.hs0.c(csh)
  diff.hs0.c(P(~H))
  diff.hs0.c(chba)
}

blocks.name: shssii
blocks.content: A closed subspace of a Hilbert space is a subset of Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 6-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: sheli
blocks.content: A member of a subspace of a Hilbert space is a vector. (Contributed by NM, 6-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: shelii
blocks.content: A member of a subspace of a Hilbert space is a vector. (Contributed by NM, 6-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: sh0
blocks.content: The zero vector belongs to any subspace of a Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: shaddcl
blocks.content: Closure of vector addition in a subspace of a Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 13-Sep-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm shaddcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(co(c1, cva, c2), c0))
} = {
  3impib(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(co(c1, cva, c2), c0))
  syl5com(wcel(c0, csh), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(co(c1, cva, c2), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), c0))))
  simpld(wcel(c0, csh), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), c0))), wral(hs0, cc, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), c0))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, csh), wa(wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), c0))), wral(hs0, cc, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), c0)))), wa(wss(c0, chba), wcel(c0v, c0)))
  issh2(hs0, hs1, c0)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, c0, c2, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(co(c1, cva, c2), c0), wcel(co(c1, cva, cv(hs1)), c0))
  eleq1d(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), c0, co(c1, cva, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c1, cva, cv(hs1))
  eleq1d(co(c1, cva, cv(hs1)), c0, co(c1, cva, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c2, c1, cva)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(c1, cva, cv(hs1)), c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(co(c1, cva, c2), c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm shaddcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0)→(c1[+h]c2)∈ c0)
} = {
  3impib(c0 ∈ SH, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ c0, (c1[+h]c2)∈ c0)
  syl5com(c0 ∈ SH, (c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0), (c1[+h]c2)∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0[+h]hs1)∈ c0)))
  simpld(c0 ∈ SH, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0[+h]hs1)∈ c0)), ∀(hs0 ∈ ℂ, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0[.h]hs1)∈ c0)))
  simprbi(c0 ∈ SH, (∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0[+h]hs1)∈ c0))∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ℂ, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0[.h]hs1)∈ c0))), (c0 ⊆ ~H ∧ 0h ∈ c0))
  issh2(hs0, hs1, c0)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, c0, c2, c0, (hs0[+h]hs1)∈ c0, (c1[+h]c2)∈ c0, (c1[+h]hs1)∈ c0)
  eleq1d((hs0[+h]hs1), c0, (c1[+h]hs1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq1(hs0, c1, cva, hs1)
  eleq1d((c1[+h]hs1), c0, (c1[+h]c2), hs1 = c2)
  oveq2(hs1, c2, c1, cva)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c1[+h]hs1)∈ c0)
  diff.hs1.w((c1[+h]c2)∈ c0)
}

blocks.name: shmulcl
blocks.content: Closure of vector scalar multiplication in a subspace of a Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 13-Sep-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm shmulcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(co(c1, csm, c2), c0))
} = {
  3impib(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(co(c1, csm, c2), c0))
  syl5com(wcel(c0, csh), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(co(c1, csm, c2), c0), wral(hs0, cc, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), c0))))
  simprd(wcel(c0, csh), wral(hs0, cc, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), c0))), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), c0))))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, csh), wa(wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), cva, cv(hs1)), c0))), wral(hs0, cc, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), c0)))), wa(wss(c0, chba), wcel(c0v, c0)))
  issh2(hs0, hs1, c0)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, cc, c2, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), c0), wcel(co(c1, csm, c2), c0), wcel(co(c1, csm, cv(hs1)), c0))
  eleq1d(co(cv(hs0), csm, cv(hs1)), c0, co(c1, csm, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c1, csm, cv(hs1))
  eleq1d(co(c1, csm, cv(hs1)), c0, co(c1, csm, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c2, c1, csm)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(co(c1, csm, cv(hs1)), c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(co(c1, csm, c2), c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm shmulcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ ∧ c2 ∈ c0)→(c1[.h]c2)∈ c0)
} = {
  3impib(c0 ∈ SH, c1 ∈ ℂ, c2 ∈ c0, (c1[.h]c2)∈ c0)
  syl5com(c0 ∈ SH, (c1 ∈ ℂ ∧ c2 ∈ c0), (c1[.h]c2)∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℂ, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0[.h]hs1)∈ c0)))
  simprd(c0 ∈ SH, ∀(hs0 ∈ ℂ, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0[.h]hs1)∈ c0)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0[+h]hs1)∈ c0)))
  simprbi(c0 ∈ SH, (∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0[+h]hs1)∈ c0))∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ ℂ, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0[.h]hs1)∈ c0))), (c0 ⊆ ~H ∧ 0h ∈ c0))
  issh2(hs0, hs1, c0)
  rspc2v(hs0, hs1, c1, cc, c2, c0, (hs0[.h]hs1)∈ c0, (c1[.h]c2)∈ c0, (c1[.h]hs1)∈ c0)
  eleq1d((hs0[.h]hs1), c0, (c1[.h]hs1), hs0 = c1)
  oveq1(hs0, c1, csm, hs1)
  eleq1d((c1[.h]hs1), c0, (c1[.h]c2), hs1 = c2)
  oveq2(hs1, c2, c1, csm)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c1[.h]hs1)∈ c0)
  diff.hs1.w((c1[.h]c2)∈ c0)
}

blocks.name: issh3
blocks.content: Subspace ` H ` of a Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: shsubcl
blocks.content: Closure of vector subtraction in a subspace of a Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm shsubcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(co(c1, cmv, c2), c0))
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c1, cmv, c2), c0, co(c1, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wceq(co(c1, cmv, c2), co(c1, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c2))), wa(wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)))
  3impib(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0), wa(wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba)))
  anim12d(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c1, chba), wcel(c2, chba))
  sseld(c1, c0, chba, wcel(c0, csh))
  sseld(c2, c0, chba, wcel(c0, csh))
  shss(c0)
  hvsubval(c1, c2)
  syld3an3(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(co(c1, cva, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c2)), c0), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c2), c0))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c2), c0))
  mp3an2(wcel(c0, csh), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), csm, c2), c0), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))
  neg1cn()
  shmulcl(c0, cneg(nat1), c2)
  shaddcl(c0, c1, co(cneg(nat1), csm, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm shsubcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0)→(c1[-h]c2)∈ c0)
} = {
  eqeltrd((c1[-h]c2), c0, (c1[+h](-u(1)[.h]c2)), (c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0))
  syl((c0 ∈ SH ∧ c1 ∈ c0 ∧ c2 ∈ c0), (c1[-h]c2)=(c1[+h](-u(1)[.h]c2)), (c1 ∈ ~H ∧ c2 ∈ ~H))
  3impib(c0 ∈ SH, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ c0, (c1 ∈ ~H ∧ c2 ∈ ~H))
  anim12d(c0 ∈ SH, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ~H, c2 ∈ ~H)
  sseld(c1, c0, chba, c0 ∈ SH)
  sseld(c2, c0, chba, c0 ∈ SH)
  shss(c0)
  hvsubval(c1, c2)
  syld3an3(c0 ∈ SH, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ c0, (c1[+h](-u(1)[.h]c2))∈ c0, (-u(1)[.h]c2)∈ c0)
  3adant2(c0 ∈ SH, c1 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ c0, (-u(1)[.h]c2)∈ c0)
  mp3an2(c0 ∈ SH, c2 ∈ c0, (-u(1)[.h]c2)∈ c0, -u(1)∈ ℂ)
  neg1cn()
  shmulcl(c0, -u(1), c2)
  shaddcl(c0, c1, (-u(1)[.h]c2))
}
